languages.text: {n}Лицо его поначалу кажется вам незнакомым... но затем приходит озарение. Возраст сильно изменил этого человека, но вы видели его ранее — на пиктах и плакатах "Разыскивается особо опасный пират". Десятки лет назад тот, кто лежит перед вами в гробу, звался Дензом Канистрой, и был одним из самых знаменитых пиратов Простора.{/n}

{n}His face seems unfamiliar at first... but then a realisation strikes you. Age has greatly changed this man's features, but you've seen him before — on picts and posters saying, "Wanted: Highly Dangerous Pirate." Decades ago, the one who is currently lying before you in a coffin used to go by the name Jerrycan Denz and was known as one of the most infamous pirates in the Koronus Expanse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо его поначалу кажется вам незнакомым... но затем приходит озарение. Возраст сильно изменил этого человека, но вы видели его ранее — на пиктах и плакатах "Разыскивается особо опасный пират". Десятки лет назад тот, кто лежит перед вами в гробу, звался Дензом Канистрой, и был одним из самых знаменитых пиратов Простора.{/n}

languages.text: {n}他的脸看起来似乎很陌生……但随后你便突然意识到，这个人的样子这么多年变了不少。你以前确实见过这张脸，是在视讯记录与通缉海报上见到的。“通缉：海盗，极其危险！”那已经是几十年前的事情了。这个躺在棺材里的人叫“油罐”丹兹，是整个科罗努斯扩区最恶名昭著的海盗之一。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His face seems unfamiliar at first... but then a realisation strikes you. Age has greatly changed this man's features, but you've seen him before — on picts and posters saying, "Wanted: Highly Dangerous Pirate." Decades ago, the one who is currently lying before you in a coffin used to go by the name Jerrycan Denz and was known as one of the most infamous pirates in the Koronus Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他的脸看起来似乎很陌生……但随后你便突然意识到，这个人的样子这么多年变了不少。你以前确实见过这张脸，是在视讯记录与通缉海报上见到的。“通缉：海盗，极其危险！”那已经是几十年前的事情了。这个躺在棺材里的人叫“油罐”丹兹，是整个科罗努斯扩区最恶名昭著的海盗之一。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al principio, no reconoces su cara... pero, después, te viene a la mente. La edad ha cambiado mucho las facciones del hombre, pero le has visto antes... en imágenes y pósteres con el texto «Se busca: pirata muy peligroso». Hace décadas, la misma persona que ahora yace en un ataúd frente a ti era conocida como Denz Bidones, uno de los piratas más infames de la Extensión de Koronus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His face seems unfamiliar at first... but then a realisation strikes you. Age has greatly changed this man's features, but you've seen him before — on picts and posters saying, "Wanted: Highly Dangerous Pirate." Decades ago, the one who is currently lying before you in a coffin used to go by the name Jerrycan Denz and was known as one of the most infamous pirates in the Koronus Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al principio, no reconoces su cara... pero, después, te viene a la mente. La edad ha cambiado mucho las facciones del hombre, pero le has visto antes... en imágenes y pósteres con el texto «Se busca: pirata muy peligroso». Hace décadas, la misma persona que ahora yace en un ataúd frente a ti era conocida como Denz Bidones, uno de los piratas más infames de la Extensión de Koronus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}最初は見慣れない顔だと思ったが…突然、ハッとする。男の顔立ちは老齢により大きく変わってしまっているが、以前にこの顔を見たことがあった。「指名手配：非常に危険な海賊」と書かれたポスターの写真の男と同じだ。目の前の棺桶に眠っている男は、数十年前にコロヌス・エクスパンスでもっとも悪名高い海賊のひとりとして知られていたジェリカン・デンツという人物だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His face seems unfamiliar at first... but then a realisation strikes you. Age has greatly changed this man's features, but you've seen him before — on picts and posters saying, "Wanted: Highly Dangerous Pirate." Decades ago, the one who is currently lying before you in a coffin used to go by the name Jerrycan Denz and was known as one of the most infamous pirates in the Koronus Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}最初は見慣れない顔だと思ったが…突然、ハッとする。男の顔立ちは老齢により大きく変わってしまっているが、以前にこの顔を見たことがあった。「指名手配：非常に危険な海賊」と書かれたポスターの写真の男と同じだ。目の前の棺桶に眠っている男は、数十年前にコロヌス・エクスパンスでもっとも悪名高い海賊のひとりとして知られていたジェリカン・デンツという人物だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zunächst kommt dir sein Gesicht unbekannt vor ... doch dann trifft dich eine Erkenntnis. Das Alter hat die Züge dieses Mannes verändert, aber du hast ihn schon gesehen – auf Vids und Plakaten: "Gesucht: extrem gefährlicher Pirat." Vor Jahrzehnten trug der Mann, der jetzt vor dir im Sarg liegt, den Namen Kanister Denz und war einer der berüchtigtsten Piraten in der Koronus-Ausdehnung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His face seems unfamiliar at first... but then a realisation strikes you. Age has greatly changed this man's features, but you've seen him before — on picts and posters saying, "Wanted: Highly Dangerous Pirate." Decades ago, the one who is currently lying before you in a coffin used to go by the name Jerrycan Denz and was known as one of the most infamous pirates in the Koronus Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zunächst kommt dir sein Gesicht unbekannt vor ... doch dann trifft dich eine Erkenntnis. Das Alter hat die Züge dieses Mannes verändert, aber du hast ihn schon gesehen – auf Vids und Plakaten: "Gesucht: extrem gefährlicher Pirat." Vor Jahrzehnten trug der Mann, der jetzt vor dir im Sarg liegt, den Namen Kanister Denz und war einer der berüchtigtsten Piraten in der Koronus-Ausdehnung.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Au premier abord, son visage ne vous dit rien... mais soudain, des souvenirs vous reviennent : des picts et des affiches à son effigie avec le texte « Recherché : pirate extrêmement dangereux ». L'âge a altéré ses traits, mais il s'agit bien du même homme. Il y a plusieurs décennies, celui qui repose maintenant dans un cercueil était l'un des pirates les plus redoutés des Étendues de Koronus : Jerrycan Denz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His face seems unfamiliar at first... but then a realisation strikes you. Age has greatly changed this man's features, but you've seen him before — on picts and posters saying, "Wanted: Highly Dangerous Pirate." Decades ago, the one who is currently lying before you in a coffin used to go by the name Jerrycan Denz and was known as one of the most infamous pirates in the Koronus Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Au premier abord, son visage ne vous dit rien... mais soudain, des souvenirs vous reviennent : des picts et des affiches à son effigie avec le texte « Recherché : pirate extrêmement dangereux ». L'âge a altéré ses traits, mais il s'agit bien du même homme. Il y a plusieurs décennies, celui qui repose maintenant dans un cercueil était l'un des pirates les plus redoutés des Étendues de Koronus : Jerrycan Denz.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yüzü ilk başta tanıdık gelmiyor, derken bir anda kafana dank ediyor. Zaman bu adamdan çok şeyler götürse de onu daha önce, "Aranıyor: Çok Tehlikeli Korsan" yazılı foto ve posterlerde görmüştün. Şu an önünde cansız yatan adam, onlarca yıl önce Bidon Denz olarak tanınıyordu ve Koronus Enginliği'nde kötülüğüyle nam salmış korsanlardan biriydi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His face seems unfamiliar at first... but then a realisation strikes you. Age has greatly changed this man's features, but you've seen him before — on picts and posters saying, "Wanted: Highly Dangerous Pirate." Decades ago, the one who is currently lying before you in a coffin used to go by the name Jerrycan Denz and was known as one of the most infamous pirates in the Koronus Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzüne bakınca çıkaramıyorsun ama sonra aniden fark ediyorsun. Zaman bu adamdan çok şeyi alıp götürmüş ama onu "Aranıyor: Çok Tehlikeli Korsan" yazılı foto ve posterlerde daha önce görmüştün. Şu an önünde cansız bedeni yatan adam, onlarca yıl önce Bidon Denz olarak tanınıyordu ve Koronus Enginliği'nin adı kötüye çıkmış korsanlarından biri olarak nam salmıştı.{/n}
